# Kristin King

| birth_place  = Piqua, Ohio, U.S.
| career_start = 1997
| career_end   = 2007
| website      =
| medaltemplates= }}
}}
Kristin T. King (born July 21, 1979) is an American ice hockey player. She won a bronze medal at the 2006 Winter Olympics. She graduated from Dartmouth College in 2002.
